headline: Navitas Semiconductor: A High-Stakes Gamble On The Future Of AI Data Centers
summary: Navitas Semiconductor shifts focus to AI data centers, aiming for $615M revenue by 2030. Read how NVTS' GaN & SiC tech drives potential amidst near-term challenges.
